commit.message:
Destabilize fixed-width const defined atomic integers

* With this PR 1.34.0 onwards const declarations of atomic integers will be
  unstable.

verification.payload:
tree f31a0044ea25cbd79365947248e425f6cc202e3a
parent c61b92beaa544b4e24ea63380d2ef5c93ed8fc9c
author Mahmut Bulut <vertexclique@gmail.com> 1550753871 +0100
committer Mahmut Bulut <vertexclique@gmail.com> 1550753871 +0100

Destabilize fixed-width const defined atomic integers

* With this PR 1.34.0 onwards const declarations of atomic integers will be
  unstable.

files.patch:
@@ -1131,6 +1131,7 @@ macro_rules! atomic_int {
      $stable_access:meta,
      $stable_from:meta,
      $stable_nand:meta,
+     $stable_init_const:meta,

@@ -1156,7 +1157,7 @@ macro_rules! atomic_int {
         }
 
         /// An atomic integer initialized to `0`.
-        #[$stable]
+        #[$stable_init_const]
         #[cfg_attr(stage0, rustc_deprecated(
             since = "1.34.0",
             reason = "the `new` function is now preferred",
@@ -1891,6 +1892,7 @@ atomic_int! {
